resources.string: This is an Shoe Inventory application for your store. You can simply keep track of your shoes and add new one. You just need to add Shoe Name, Company, Shoe Size and Description. And when you want to check all your shoes again, the recently added shoe will be shown in the list
Welcome to the app Shoe Store!
Here you can keep track of your shoes listed, add new shoes and check the description of each shoe. This project is developed during Udacity Android course using MVVM and Navigation components
Add a new shoe item to your collection
Here you should write name for your new shoe. The name should be associated with the official model name of the shoe
Here you should enter a size of your shoe, it could be also half the size(44.5 for example)
Here you just need to write the manufacturer-company who produced your shoes
And here should be a concise description what are the shoes designed for
